about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet the SkinLab team and our story
about.storyParagraph1: {companyName} was founded in 2024 with the goal of providing professional, reliable cosmetic equipment to salons at fair prices.
about.storyParagraph2: Our founders have worked in the beauty industry for years and know exactly what challenges salon owners face: expensive machines, uncertain quality, lacking service support, and opaque importers.
about.storyParagraph3: That's why we created SkinLab: to offer a reliable partner who not only sells equipment but provides comprehensive support for successful salon operations.
about.benefit1Desc: Direct manufacturer relationships, no unnecessary middlemen. Same quality, fraction of the price.
about.benefit2Desc: Machine arrives in 2 weeks, no waiting for months.
about.benefit3Desc: Double the industry standard. Full protection.
about.benefit4Desc: 4-6 hours of personal training + FAR certificate included in the price.
about.benefit5Desc: Local service center, loaner device during repairs.
about.benefit6Desc: We don't leave you alone after purchase. Call us anytime.
about.ctaSubtitle: Get in touch and let's discuss how we can help grow your salon.

training.title: Training
training.subtitle: Official operator courses with FAR certificate

errors.404desc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

whyUs.title: Why Successful Salons Choose SkinLab?
whyUs.subtitle: We don't just sell machines – we help as partners to make your investment pay off as quickly as possible.
whyUs.trainingDesc: 4-6 hours of personal training + FAR certificate + video materials. We won't let you go until you use the machine confidently.
whyUs.warrantyDesc: No waiting weeks for foreign service. We respond within 24 hours, and if needed, we provide a replacement device.
whyUs.financingDesc: From ~€250/month. No need to pay all at once – the machine's revenue pays the installments.
whyUs.consultingDesc: We help with pricing and marketing. We share what successful salons do.
whyUs.testimonialText: The training was great, and I can call them anytime I have a question.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: 4 simple steps to successful launch
howItWorks.step1Desc: Free in-person or online demo where you get to know the machines
howItWorks.step2Desc: We help you choose the best machine for your salon
howItWorks.step3Desc: On-site setup and 4-6 hours of training
howItWorks.step4Desc: Ongoing support, service and business consulting

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from Hungarian salon owners
testimonials.quote1: The Prestige4WAVE paid for itself in 3 months. The training was professional, and having local service is reassuring. I used to work with IPL, this is night and day.
testimonials.quote2: In the first month alone, our revenue increased by 20% thanks to laser treatments. Our clients love it, and we love how easy it is to use.
testimonials.quote3: Since getting the HydraCrown, we've attracted a new client base. The AI skin diagnostics impresses them. Only downside: it needs more space than I expected.

ctaSection.title: Have Questions? We're Here to Help!
ctaSection.subtitle: Request a free consultation and our experts will provide personalized advice on the best solution for you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy of SkinLab Beauty Equipment Kft. Learn about how we handle your personal data.
privacy.introTitle: What is a Privacy Policy and why is it important?
privacy.introText1: The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to transparently inform you about what personal data we collect, for what purposes we process it, how we ensure its protection, and what rights you have regarding data processing.
privacy.introText2: When using our webshop – including browsing, placing orders, customer service inquiries, or requesting certificates related to training – we handle the data you provide confidentially, in accordance with applicable laws, prioritizing data security and transparency.
privacy.section1Text: This privacy policy contains the rules for data processing in the webshop operated by {companyName}.
privacy.section4Title: 4. Purposes and Legal Bases of Data Processing
privacy.section6Text: Data is only transferred to the extent necessary for service provision:
privacy.noThirdCountryTransfer: We do not transfer data to third countries.
privacy.rightAccessDesc: You can request information about what data we process about you.
privacy.rightRectificationDesc: You can request the correction of inaccurate data.
privacy.rightErasureDesc: You can request the deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten").
privacy.rightRestrictionDesc: You can request the restriction of data processing.
privacy.rightPortabilityDesc: You can request your data in a machine-readable format.
privacy.rightObjectionDesc: You can object to data processing.
privacy.rightWithdrawDesc: You can withdraw your consent at any time.
privacy.section8Text: If you believe that you have suffered a legal violation in connection with our data processing, you can file a complaint with the following authority:
privacy.naihName: National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH)
privacy.section9Text: The Website uses cookies to improve user experience and ensure website functionality.
privacy.section9_1Text: These cookies are necessary for the basic operation of the Website and cannot be disabled.
privacy.section9_2Text: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic.
privacy.section10Text: The Data Controller applies appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data:
privacy.section11Text: This privacy policy may be modified from time to time. The current version is always available on the website.
privacy.section12Text: For privacy-related questions, please contact us at:
